title: With Iraq In Turmoil, Kirkuk's Leader Says Region Is Calm
teaser: After Iraq's national security forces abandoned Kirkuk, Kurdish fighters dug in to defend their home. For more on the matter, Melissa Block turns to Najmaldin Karim, the governor of Kirkuk province.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
